message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, but I think I deserve more for being the first to make a move. Take a smaller share this time!
You took a big chunk last time, now it's my turn to adjust. I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time.
You think you can take it back with a smaller share? I'll take most of it this time, and leave you with a tiny bit!
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not going to let you take everything. I'll give you a slightly bigger share this time, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You think you can outmaneuver me with a slightly bigger share? I'll take almost all of it, and leave you with a tiny fraction!
You're really trying to squeeze me out, aren't you? I'll give you a bigger share this time, but don't think you're getting away with it that easily!
You're getting desperate, and I'm getting greedy. I'll take almost all of it, and leave you with a tiny fraction!
You're really trying to starve me out, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly bigger share this time, but don't think you're getting away with it that easily!
You're running out of options, and I'm running out of patience. I'll take almost all of it, and leave you with a tiny crumb!
You're really trying to squeeze the last bit of value out of me, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly bigger share this time, but don't think you're getting away with it that easily!
It's my last chance to get something, so I'll take almost all of it. You've had your chances, now it's my turn to take the lion's share!
